title: Planning in AI
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Finding a sequence of actions (Plan) to achieve a goal state from an initial state. 
Unlike Search (which is atomic), Planning opens up states (factored) to understand causality.

examples.code:
Precondition: At(p, JFK)
Action: Fly(JFK, LHR)
Effect: !At(p, JFK), At(p, LHR)

real_world_use_cases.description: Planning path and scientific operations for the day autonomously.
